title: Mischa Bredewold in the Driving Seat at Izulia Women, Scooping Second Consecutive Stage Win
content:
Dutchwoman Bredewold extends overall GC lead with another powerful performance, teammate Van der Breggen out of race.

Read the full article at Mischa Bredewold in the Driving Seat at Izulia Women, Scooping Second Consecutive Stage Win on Velo.
author: sstokes
